text: Mohsen Haji-Mirzaei (, born 1959) is Iran's Minister of Education. Mirzaei was nominated by Hassan Rouhani to succeed Mohammad Bathaei. He received a majority vote from the Islamic Consultative Assembly in September 2019. == Life == Mirzaei earbed a Bachelor's degree in Social Sciences from the University of Tehran, a Master's degree in Management from the State Management Center and a Doctorate in Sociology from the Islamic Azad University, Tehran. == Advisors == *Majid Ghadamihttps://medu.ir/fa/news/item/1018317/مجید-قدمی،-مشاور-وزیر- آموزش-‌و-پرورش-ش?ocode=100010876 *Ali Askarihttps://medu.ir/fa/news/item/1041248/علی-عسکری،-مشاور-وزیرآموزش-و-پرورش- شد?ocode=100010876 *Reza Madadihttp://www.pana.ir/news/918560 *Mohammad Mehdi Nooripour *Abdorasoul Emadi == References == Category:Iranian people Category:Iranian political people Category:Iranian educators Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:People from Qom
title: Mohsen Haji-Mirzaei
